sentences.en: They have put substantial funds into rebuilding one of the most run-down areas.
sentences.cn: 他们已投入大量的资金用于重建最破败的地区之一。

sentences.en: We need to concentrate resources on the most run-down areas.
sentences.cn: 我们需要把资源集中用于最衰败的地区。

sentences.en: When 23-year-old Marilyn Brown started to feel run-down last December, it never occurred to her that she could have tuberculosis.
sentences.cn: 当23岁的玛丽莲•布朗去年12月开始感到疲惫的时候，她未曾想到她会得肺结核。
